item.description: We are an independent Old World of Darkness LARP that takes place in Southeastern Connecticut. For those of you looking for a new roleplaying experience, or those of you who have larped Mind's Eye Theatre before, come check us out! For those who are new to LARPing in General or have never LARPed old world of darkness, come down - its a great experience and we are very new player friendly. If you don't mind a drive (luckily, not a terribly long one), we are running an independent old world of darkness camarilla vampire LARP that generally takes place in Groton, CT on the fourth Saturday of every month. We always have room for more players. Email EdgeofDarknessLARP@gmail.com for more details also, visit our forums at http://eodforums.edgeofdarknessct.com
item.name: Edge of Darkness LARP (Old World of Darkness Vampire)
